meta.title: DeepTrans Studio Documentation
meta.description: Welcome to the complete documentation for DeepTrans Studio. This is an intelligent translation workbench that integrates machine translation, quality assessment, post-editing, and project management. Whether you are a translation expert, project manager, or developer, you'll find the guides and references you need here.

home.title: DeepTrans Studio Documentation
home.subtitle: Welcome to the complete documentation for DeepTrans Studio. This is an intelligent translation workbench that integrates machine translation, quality assessment, post-editing, and project management. Whether you are a translation expert, project manager, or developer, you'll find the guides and references you need here.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: 5-minute quick start guide to understand basic features and workflows

workflows.title: Translation Workflows
workflows.description: Learn about pre-translation, QA, and post-editing workflows

concepts.title: Core Concepts
concepts.description: Understand projects, documents, segments, and other core concepts

ai.title: AI Agents
ai.description: Learn about discourse query, quality assessment, and rewriting features

ui.title: UI Guide
ui.description: Get familiar with editors, panels, toolbars, and other UI elements

workflow.title: Intelligent Translation Workflow
workflow.description: From pre-translation to QA to post-editing, a complete translation production pipeline with AI assistants at every step.

collaboration.title: Real-time Collaborative Editing
collaboration.description: Support for simultaneous multi-user editing with real-time synchronization, complete version control, and review processes.

quality.title: Quality Assurance System
quality.description: Terminology consistency checks, grammar checks, translation quality scoring - multi-dimensional quality assurance.

management.title: Project Management Integration
management.description: Complete project lifecycle management from creation to delivery with full visibility and tracking.
